snippet.title: HUNTERS' PATH REBIRTH (S Rank) - Assemble your squad, vanquish evil and reap the rewards!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://hwilson.itch.io/hunters-path-rebirth?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt HUNTERS' PATH: REBIRTH is an on-foot shooter like Mercenary Force or Outzone or Knightmare, pitting a ragtag but devout squad of Knights, Outlaws, Mages, and Samurai against the evils of a fantasy(?) world full of destroyable scenery...

Vanquish evil and reap the rewards - gold Coins and emerald Gems you can spend to customise your squad.

➡️ More from hwilson https://hwilson.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More games with pixel art https://itch.io/games/tag-pixel-art?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
